channel.title: [508] Overhead NPC dialogue[Help]
channel.description:
Subject pretty much says it all o.o
I've searched around a bit, but the only thing I can personally find for help on this subject. Is for 317's.
I'm using a Bulby source and I was personally wondering HOW to change/add NPC dialogue.
Fast help would be much appreciated! :D
Thanks, ~Rosie

item.title: [508] Overhead NPC dialogue[Help]
item.dc:creator: @mod_jesus mod jesus
item.description:

thats for overhead text
[/quote]

Yup it is, sorry, I posted without testing it out.
Dx

Thanks, I’d rep ya… but… O.O[/quote]

i understand u need 15 rep lol

item.title: [508] Overhead NPC dialogue[Help]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“I_AM_LEGEND, post:2, topic:318865”]add a dialogues.cgf

[code]/npc speaks
//---------id—type----nextdia-dialoguetext1-------------------------------------------dialoguetext2-------------------dialoguetext3
dialogue = 550 1 0 Come_back_when_you_have_the_ingredients. EMPTY EMPTY
dialogue = 1694 1 0 Happy_Halloween_from_Project_Czar! EMPTY EMPTY
//player speaks (same as 1)
//---------id—type----nextdia-dialoguetext1-------------------------------------------dialoguetext2-------------------dialoguetext3

//player must choose
//---------id—type----nexto1–nexto2–nexto3–swclose-swfar—question------------------------option1-----------------------------------------option2-----------------------------------------option3
dialogue = 306 2 5 0 0 1 0 Select_an_option Where_is_Kalrag? Okay_bye. EMPTY 307
dialogue = 1002 2 6 0 0 1 0 Select_an_option Of_course Nope. EMPTY 0
dialogue = 2260 2 7 0 0 1 0 Select_an_option Hell_yeah! No_Thanks. EMPTY 0
dialogue = 9001 2 5 0 0 1 0 Select_an_option Sure Nope EMPTY 9002
dialogue = 9003 2 8 0 0 1 0 Select_an_option Okay. Gay… EMPTY 0
dialogue = 370 2 1 0 0 1 0 Select_an_option FFS_you_homo. lol. EMPTY 0
[ENDOFDIALOGUELIST] [/code]

and maybe coding something like this.

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 11, 2009, 01:41:33 am[/size][hr]THATS FOR 317 SORRY[/quote]
You just gave me the idea to add this to 508…

Read full topic

item.title: [508] Overhead NPC dialogue[Help]
item.dc:creator: @mod_jesus mod jesus
item.description:
@mod_jesus wrote:

ill tell u

go in bulby(if server not bulby dont follow)

npc, then open npc.java
search } if (combatDelay > 0) { combatDelay--;
under that put } if (npcType == npc id) { requestText("wat u want to say"); }
enjoy

Read full topic
